projects.title: Android APP: Weather
descriptions: Created a list based user interface to display detailed weather forecast in the next 7 days
Fetched and parsed real-time weather data by the Open Weather Map API
Provided settings to choose location and temperature unit

projects.title: Cloud Storage and Rating System
descriptions: Developed the website backend framework based on MVC concept and Apache Tomcat
Designed and implemented the database schema on MySQL to store user info and file metadata
Cached data in server based on LRU, handling large scale requests with high performance
Built a PC client by using Java Swing GUI and AWS SDK for java
projects.tech: JAVA, AWS S3, Servlet/JSP, Apache Tomcat, MVC, JDBC, MySQL

projects.title: Data Communication Based on 3G Module
descriptions: Developed a software by using C# in support of sending different type files regularly and sending short message (SMS) based on TCP and UDP protocol
Created 3 data structures for maintaining connectivity and transmitting data
Reached 13kb/s maximum download/upload speed without any errors on public 3G network
